header.share_dialog_desc: Anyone with this link can view the current status of this claim. The link expires in 7 days.

public.title: Claim Status
public.no_pii_notice: This is a secure, limited view. For full details, please log in.

next_step.draft: Please submit your claim for review.
next_step.submitted: We have received your claim and will assign it to a case manager shortly.
next_step.verification: We are verifying the provided documents and evidence.
next_step.evaluation: Our experts are evaluating the damages and liability.
next_step.negotiation: We are negotiating with the insurance company for a fair settlement.
next_step.rejected: The claim could not be processed.
